items.sentence: There is something important I want to discuss with you.
Tom and Mary aren\'t the only two who don\'t understand.
That day, Tom bought as many cameras as he could afford.
If I\'d known Tom\'s phone number, I\'d have called him.
Tom and Mary worked in the same company for three years.
There\'s a man that I don\'t know in front of the house.
I almost did what you\'re accusing me of, but I didn\'t.
Tom knows what to do when Mary has an epileptic seizure.
Tom offered Mary some money, but she refused to take it.
This would taste better if you added a little more salt.
